Name: Tag Hop
About the game: Run!                                          Catch! Tag Hop is a fast-paced movement based parkour PvP game combining bunny hop & other advanced movement mechanics with simple playground Tag. Run away and dodge chasers with advanced movement. Or catch runners with route predictions. Just like Tag in real life. Join discussions about Tag Hop on r/TagHop and join the community Discord server to be the first to see new content, as well as being a part of the development process of Tag Hop! And most importantly: Have fun! Game modes Tag Hop includes 4 different game modes: Playground/Classic Tag Infected Points Tag Elimination Features Dedicated servers Smooth movement: bunnyhop, diving, surfing, advanced crouch techniques. Competitive & casual lobbies Rooftops styled environments Extra content: grayblock maps
